ats:Lavender.NAME: Лаванда
ats:Lavender.FLAVOR: В ботаническом саду парфюмера, всегда присутствует аромат лаванды.

ats:Blood Sample Collection.NAME: Коллекция проб крови
ats:Blood Sample Collection.FLAVOR: "Ей понравится, если я принесу это мистеру Бладу, верно?"

ats:Spiritual Recovery.NAME: Духовное восстановление
ats:Spiritual Recovery.FLAVOR: Это содержит небольшое количество экстракта горчицы...

ats:Rhine Circuitry.NAME: Originium Zone Generator
ats:Rhine Circuitry.FLAVOR: Originium crystals are planted in advance to ensure that the Caster team can complete their mission. This form of combat...
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, apply #b

ats:Military Tradition.NAME: Transporter-Type Meebo
ats:Military Tradition.FLAVOR: The “Great Meebo Monument” is covered with the codenames of its compatriots, but it knows no joy or sorrow. It simply wants to work.

ats:Ability Aura.NAME: Braintet
ats:Ability Aura.FLAVOR: A new type of energy draught developed by Parasol Pharmaceuticals. It’s sugar free, has a minty taste, and has no side effects.

ats:Omniscience.NAME: “Self-Defense Handbook”
ats:Omniscience.FLAVOR: Its complete title is, “Handbook of Self-Defense When Traveling to the City-States of Other Countries Surrounding Laterano and the Zones Between Them.” You can read it, but you can’t learn anything from it.
DESCRIPTIONS: В каждом бою даёт #b25% #yВременных #yОЗ от ваших максимальных ОЗ.

ats:Sanity.NAME: Здравомыслие
DESCRIPTIONS: Возвращает #yОТ и даёт половину #yЗащиты от #yОТ, которые вы потратили первыми во время хода. (Максимум #b5)

ats:Sanity Plus.NAME: Здравомыслие+
DESCRIPTIONS: Заменяет #rЗдравомыслие. Возвращает #yОТ и даёт половину #yЗащиты от #yОТ, которые вы потратили первыми во время хода. NL Повышает #yМаксимальный #yлимит #yОТ на #b10.

ats:Berate.NAME: Captain Morgan’s Wine
ats:Berate.FLAVOR: A wine produced in the Iberian region. Despite having gained popularity in the heart of Victoria’s bustling cities, it is now discontinued.

ats:Industrial Water Cannon.NAME: Superelastic Alloy Spring
ats:Industrial Water Cannon.FLAVOR: High-quality springs with several times the elasticity of normal springs. Regardless of how you use them, be careful not to hurt yourself.
DESCRIPTIONS: Когда вы тратите #yОТ , вы берёте карту.

ats:Bonebreaker.NAME: Corroded Silver Lance
ats:Bonebreaker.FLAVOR: A lance that can pierce mountains and lakes, accompanied by the trampling of hooves that can disperse gathered clouds. Fireworks and advertisements have dulled everyone’s memories, but they are still out there.

ats:Arts.NAME: Sabotage Co-op Expansion
ats:Arts.FLAVOR: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose and add #b3 #yCaster cards to your deck.

ats:Assault.NAME: Assault Co-op Expansion
ats:Assault.FLAVOR: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose and add #b3 #yVanguard cards to your deck.

ats:Attack.NAME: Assault Co-op Reinforcements
ats:Attack.FLAVOR: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose and add #b3 #yGuard cards to your deck.

ats:Defend.NAME: Fortification Co-op Expansion
ats:Defend.FLAVOR: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose and add #b3 #yDefender cards to your deck.

ats:Cure.NAME: Ranged Co-op Expansion
ats:Cure.FLAVOR: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose and add #b3 #yMedic cards to your deck.

ats:Snipe.NAME: Ranged Co-op Reinforcements
ats:Snipe.FLAVOR: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose and add #b3 #ySniper cards to your deck.

ats:Special.NAME: Sabotage Co-op Reinforcements
ats:Special.FLAVOR: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose and add #b3 #ySpecialist cards to your deck.

ats:Support.NAME: Fortification Co-op Reinforcements
ats:Support.FLAVOR: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose and add #b3 #ySupporter cards to your deck.

ats:Hidden Killer.NAME: Скрытный убийца
ats:Hidden Killer.FLAVOR: Почему бы тебе не протянуть ей руку?
DESCRIPTIONS: Если вы не разыгрывали #yАтаки в этом ходу, даёт #b2 #yВременных #yСилы в следующий ход.

ats:Gyao.NAME: "Roar" Pendant
ats:Gyao.FLAVOR: An amulet circulated among a few members of the L.G.D. who don’t take their work very seriously. Said to be able to double one’s bonuses.
DESCRIPTIONS: Даёт #b15 дополнительного золота, когда вы получаете золото.

ats:Originium.NAME: Оргиниумная зависимость
ats:Originium.FLAVOR: Поговаривают, что ближние разыскивают чистый Оргиниум.

ats:Tactical Delivery.NAME: Crate of Explosive Building Materials
ats:Tactical Delivery.FLAVOR: Rhodes Island’s portable basic building materials kits are limited in quantity. If lost, please reapply for redistribution. Please assemble according to the instructions.
DESCRIPTIONS: Даёт [E] в начале вашего хода. Снижает #yМаксимальный #yлимит #yОТ (50) на #b20.

ats:Emergency Defibrillator.NAME: Экстренный дефибрилятор
ats:Emergency Defibrillator.FLAVOR: Не будьте излишне агрессивны, когда применяется дефибрилятор.
DESCRIPTIONS: Когда ваши ОЗ падают ниже #b25%, получаемый вами урон снижается до 0 в этот ход и вы восполняете #b50% ОЗ в начале вашего следующего хода. NL (Срабатывает один раз)
Получаемый вами урон снижается до 0 в этот ход и вы восполняете #b50% ОЗ в начале вашего следующего хода.

ats:Remnant Ash.NAME: Прах былого
DESCRIPTIONS: Когда вы получаете смертельный урон, ваши ОЗ не могут быть ниже #b1. NL #rВы #rумрёте #rчерез #r2 #rхода. NL (Срабатывает один раз)
Ваши ОЗ не могут быть ниже #b1. Вы #rумрёте через #b

ats:Hearts K.NAME: Король червей
DESCRIPTIONS: В начале боя, отнимает #b4 #yСилы у ВСЕХ врагов на 1 ход.

ats:Hearts K Plus.NAME: Король червей+
ats:Hearts K Plus.FLAVOR: "Нужно просто всех убить, так? Звучит просто? Но это та ещё заноза в мягком месте..."

ats:NULL.NAME: This relic is for add new one
